graphql.query:
query event ($limit: Int, $offset: Int, $id: String) {
    event (id: $id) {
        name
        id
        business {
            name
            id
            is_claimed
            is_closed
            url
            phone
            display_phone
            review_count
            categories {
                title
                alias
            }
            rating
            price
            location {
                address1
                address2
                address3
                city
                state
                zip_code
                country
                formatted_address
            }
            coordinates {
                latitude
                longitude
            }
            photos
            hours {
                hours_type
                is_open_now
            }
            reviews (limit: $limit, offset: $offset) {
                rating
                text
                time_created
                url
            }
            attributes
        }
        business_id
        attending_count
        category
        cost
        cost_max
        country
        description
        event_site_url
        image_url
        interested_count
        is_canceled
        is_free
        is_official
        latitude
        longitude
        location {
            address1
            address2
            address3
            city
            state
            zip_code
            country
            formatted_address
        }
        tickets_url
        time_end
        time_start
        zip_code
    }
}

query event_search ($locale: String, $offset: Int, $limit: Int, $sort_by: String, $sort_on: String, $start_date: Int, $end_date: Int, $categories: [String], $is_free: Boolean, $location: String, $latitude: Float, $longitude: Float, $radius: Float) {
    event_search (locale: $locale, offset: $offset, limit: $limit, sort_by: $sort_by, sort_on: $sort_on, start_date: $start_date, end_date: $end_date, categories: $categories, is_free: $is_free, location: $location, latitude: $latitude, longitude: $longitude, radius: $radius) {
        events {
            name
            id
            business {
                name
                id
                is_claimed
                is_closed
                url
                phone
                display_phone
                review_count
                rating
                price
                photos
                attributes
            }
            business_id
            attending_count
            category
            cost
            cost_max
            country
            description
            event_site_url
            image_url
            interested_count
            is_canceled
            is_free
            is_official
            latitude
            longitude
            location {
                address1
                address2
                address3
                city
                state
                zip_code
                country
                formatted_address
            }
            tickets_url
            time_end
            time_start
            zip_code
        }
        total
    }
}
